extendedInfo.description: Customize your view of the over 3,000 clinical review articles brought to your practice by The Clinics each year.Clinical Review Articles from The Clinics offer you the most current clinical information enhanced with exclusive      expert perspective. Clinical Review Articles synthesize primary research on a given topic, and also provide you with perspective from key opinion leaders in the field. These experts provide you with a fast track analysis of the most relevant informatioon the topic along with their experince and insight on how you can apply it right away to improve patient outcomes.Clinical Review Articles from The Clinics are also an accessible way to stay current on the latest trends and research in the field and the Clinics app allows you to take the latest review article with you wherever you go.Features of The Clinics appi)    A customizable interface that allows you to follow 49 Clinics titles in these 11 unique medical disciplines: Cardi      logy, Radiology/Imaging, Surgery, Internal Medicine, Ambulatory Care, Emergency/Critical Care,                                  Gastroenteroloy/Liver, Hospital Medicine, Orthopedics/Biomechanics/Rehabilitation, Pathology, Psychiatryii)  Free access to all tables of contents and abstracts for each available issue upon app downloadiii) Simple article navigation lets you find the information you need with section headers and a scrollbar to access        specific points through out each article or read the entire article in convenient PDF formativ) Bookmark your favorite articles and add your own notes for esy reference.Full articles and PDF versions are available to current online subscribers of theclinics.com.Print subscribers who are registered on theclinics.com get free access to their Clinics series.Not a Clinics subscriber yet? You can conveniently subscribe within the app to any series you wish to follow. The in-app subscription option allows you to purchase a 12 month subscription to any of the 49 titles below for only      $69.99 each.1. Anesthesiology Clinics2.Cardiac Electrophysiology Clinics3.Cardiology Clinics4.Child & Adolescent Psychiatric Clincics5.Clinics in Chest Medicine6.Clincis in Geriatric Medicine7.Clinics in Laboratory Medicine8.Clinics in Liver Disease9.Clinics in Perinatology10.Clinics in Plastic Surgery11.Clinics in Podiatric Medicine and Surgery12.Clinics in Sports Medicine13.Critical Care Clinics14.Dermatologic Clinics15.Emergency Medicine Clinics16.Endocrinology Metabolism Clinics17.Facial Plastic Surgery Clinics18.Foot and Ankle Clinics19.Gastroenterology Clinics20.Gastrointestinal Endoscopy Clinics21.Hospital Medicine Clinics22.Hand Clinics23.Heart Failure Clinics24.Hematology/Oncology Clinics25.Immunology and Allergy Clinics26.Infectious Disease Clinics27.Interventional Cardiology Clinics28.Magnetic Resonance Imaging Clinics29.Medical Clinics30.Neuroimaging Clinics31.Neurologic Clinics32.Neurosurgery Clinics33.Obstetrics & Gynecology Clinics34.Orthopedic Clinics35.Otolaryngologic Clinics36.Pediatric Clinics37.PET Clinics38.Physical Medicine & Rehabilitation Clinics39.Primary Care: Clinics in Office Practice40.Psychiatric Clinics41.Radiologic Clinics42.Theumatic Disease Clinics43.Sleep Medicine Clinics44.Surgical Clinics45.Surgical Oncology Clinics46.Surgical Pathology Clinics47.Thoracic Surgery Clinics48.Ultrasound Clinics49.Urologic ClinicsAn in-app subscription gives you complete access to the title purchases, including full text articles and PDFs, and will auto-renew after 12 months, until you decide to cancel.Your subscription includes access to  a 12-month archive of back issues .For feedback and suggestions on how to improve the app please send us email at AllClinicsOnline@elsevier.comFor technical support please email technical.support@elsevier.comOr find us @ClinicsReviews on Twitter.
